com.github.pidygb.gestureutilities

Interface ScrollToHideRecyclerViewListener.OnScrollToHideCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    ScrollToHideRecyclerViewListener 

    public static interface ScrollToHideRecyclerViewListener.OnScrollToHideCallback
    The callback interface used by ScrollToHideRecyclerViewListener to inform its client to hide or not something because the RecyclerView page scrolls.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canHide()
      Enable or disable hide function
      void hide(boolean hide)
      Show or hide
